version_description:
* ReplayKit! Do we need to say more?
* Controller support! Wow!

NEW MENUS
Bling bling. We're pimpin’ our menus to look nice. Like in real videogames.

* Improved goat selector with hints for how to unlock all goats. Because using YouTube is cheating.
* Swipe to move between goat apps. Even a monkey could do it.
* New better looking NPC people. Just as fun to headbutt. Maybe even more.

Bug fixes

* You no longer get stuck in ragdoll with certain goats
* ReplayKit fixes for iOS10

* Level select updated to include a NEW LEVEL added for owners of GoatZ.
* There are even zombies dressed up as other monsters. That’s gotta count for something?
* Bug fixes

NEW FREE LEVEL ADDED!
Visit the winter-clad land of Västerås and save the holidays in the biggest free level since free levels was a thing. I know what you’re thinking. WoW. Am I right? That’s right. It’s Goat MMO Simulator: WoW.

FEATURES
* Be a special snowflake and try the new elf class, like everybody else
* Close to 20 new quests. We didn’t quite hit 20. But almost!
* All of them are really cool though, like the one where you invent electricity…
* Or when you fight the forest! Or eat a house to the ground. That one is cool too.
* Go north of the wall. It can’t stop you. But it will try. But it can’t
* There is winter already. We are way ahead of that show on TV

* Level select updated to include a NEW LEVEL added for owners of Goat Simulator: Waste of Space
* Bug fixes

* Level select updated to include the ALL NEW app Goat Simulator: Payday
* Bug fixes

Crossover goats are here! Want fantasy goats in space? YEAH! Want regular old goats in the zombie apocalypse? We sure hope so!

- Get the crossover packs for the Goat Simulator Apps you own FOR FREE
- Use money to get the rest.
- Support for iPhone 8 and iPhone 8 Plus

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Bug Fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Bug Fixes
